Guys help me out!
I have Windows XP SP3, Pentium D 3Ghz, 2gb ram,nVidia gt220 1gb GPU.
Here is my problem:
I've unpacked .rar file then mounted it by using demon tools, installed game succesfully. When I tried to run game, it gives error that,
"o.s. is not proving window to render graphics",
followed by secound error that,
"C++ runtime liabrary error".
I can play its trail version. But fails on full version.
Please tell me what to do?

I found solution for my own problem.
Any on having same problem can use this solution.
If you having problem of OS window not support or C++ runtime error, then you can download and install, "18 wheels of steel pedal to the metal V1.07 patch" after installing game.
Good luck!

click to download the patch 

http://www.valusoftsupport.com/library/patch/RETAIL_CD_VERSION_ONLY_1_07.exe
